hero.title: AI-Powered DevTools
hero.tagline: Bring Claude AI directly into your Nuxt development workflow. Chat, debug, and build faster with context-aware assistance.
hero.preview_user: How do I add authentication to this component?
hero.preview_assistant: Looking at your UserCard component, I can help you add authentication...

features.section_subtitle: A complete AI assistant integrated into your development environment

chat.title: Chat with Claude
chat.description: Interact with Claude AI directly from your DevTools. Ask questions, get code suggestions, and debug issues conversationally.

context.title: Rich Context
context.description: Automatically passes viewport size, current route, browser info, and selected components. Claude always knows what you're working on.

collab.title: Collaborative Mode
collab.description: Share your dev server via tunnel (Cloudflare, ngrok). Set DEV_TUNNEL_HOST and work together from any device.

docs.title: Project Docs
docs.description: Reference your project documentation with {'@'}docs/ autocomplete. Claude reads your docs to give contextual answers.

commands.title: Slash Commands
commands.description: Use /commands for quick actions. Create custom commands in .claude/commands/ to automate repetitive tasks.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: Extend Claude with Model Context Protocol servers. Connect to databases, APIs, or custom tools.

agents.title: Custom Agents
agents.description: Define specialized agents for different tasks. Each agent has its own model, prompt, and allowed tools.

skills.title: Skills System
skills.description: Create reusable skills that Claude applies automatically based on context. Perfect for coding standards and patterns.

voice.title: Voice Input
voice.description: Speak your questions naturally. Voice recognition with support for multiple languages.

plugins.title: Claude Code Plugins
plugins.description: Access and manage Claude Code plugins directly from DevTools. Extend functionality with community and custom plugins.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Mode
collaborative.description: Use any tunnel solution (Cloudflare, ngrok, etc.) and set DEV_TUNNEL_HOST. The nuxt-claude-devtools-bc module handles Vite configuration automatically.
collaborative.feature3: Share link and work from any device

modes.section_subtitle: Choose the mode that fits your workflow

light.title: Light Mode
light.description: A lightweight chat overlay for quick interactions. Perfect for designers, product managers, and business users who want AI assistance without developer tools.

devtools.title: DevTools Mode
devtools.description: Full integration with Nuxt DevTools. Manage Claude Code extension, access advanced features, and get deep codebase context.

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.subtitle: Get up and running in under a minute

cta.title: Ready to supercharge your development?
cta.subtitle: Join developers using Claude to build better Nuxt applications faster.
